revised_title: The Establishment and Growth of the Lister Institute of Preventive Medicine
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical History
tldr: The article discusses the history of the Lister Institute of Preventive Medicine, from its initial establishment in London to its growth and development. It highlights the challenges faced, such as opposition from anti-vivisectionists and the need for a suitable location, and the eventual amalgamation with the College of State Medicine. The Institute aimed to investigate various infectious diseases and develop protective and curative materials.
